overview: Tony Bifano is an entrepreneur and venture capitalist with launch and commercialization expertise. Tony specializes in assembling technology, people, and products to capture emerging markets. Bifano has served on the Boards of Meetmoi, ReverbNation, and Ryzing. Over the past 15 years, Bifano has assembled and operated multiple emerging growth technology businesses. He was a founder and CEO of Aroundcampus that was acquired by Hearst and University Directories. Bifano served as a turnaround CEO of Boomi, an enterprise data integration platform startup recently acquired by Dell. Bifano was a member of the leadership team behind the high growth healthcare data business, Health Market Science, that was acquired by Edison. A native of Buffalo, New York, Bifano began his career as a programmer for Accenture in the Technology Practice. He received his Industrial Engineering degree from Penn State University.
